item.title: This serious, dangerous patchwork of potholes has been reported many times: even reported as fixed! Croft st, which never was a problem has been resurfaced!, 25th May
item.description:
What three words Truly.orchestra.groups …All you need! Issue has been there for ? 2 ? Years don’t mess around with it again, just correct it properly, please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th May
item.description:
The drain located at a drop kerb pedestrian crossing on the corner of Clarence Road / Portland Street is blocked. After mild rainfall surface water is evident causing a hazard for pedestrians and wheel chair users alike.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Portland Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Previously repaired pot hole eroding again, 24th May
item.description:
Across the road from driveway to Hill Barn, directly in line with sycamore tree. Many potholes nearby have been marked for repair so please do this one at the same time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tall hedge cut down now, 24th May
item.description:
A tall tree hedge has been cut down next to Phoenix Meadow property. It is bird nesting season! No hedge cutting March to August! It is next to a PROW. There is no signage alerting walkers to falling trees. How can this be allowed? This landowner picks bank holiday weekends to do damage, and he knows the council will do nothing. What's the point of rules and regulations if they are flouted and nothing is said.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): School Lane, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
